pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:6.4: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.13: Tāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:7.14: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:8.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:8.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:9.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:9.3: Saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:9.4: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:10.1: Dinnā saṃghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammuti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:10.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:11.1: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:11.2: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:12.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:13.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:14.10: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:15.1: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:15.5: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
